text: Everybody's Doin' the Hustle & Dead on the Double Bump is the 41st studio album by American musician James Brown. The album was released in September 1975, by Polydor Records. ==Track listing== All tracks composed by James Brown; except where indicated ==Personnel== *Bob Both - production supervision, recording and mixing engineer *David Stone, Major Little - assistant engineer *Douglas Gervasi - cover photography ==References== Category:1975 albums Category:James Brown albums Category:Albums produced by James Brown Category:Polydor Records albums
title: Everybody's Doin' the Hustle & Dead on the Double Bump
